context.name: Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Z8i 1.7-13.3×42 rifle scope from Swarovski Optik is a versatile scope to have at hand. Its remarkable field of view and light weight give you the overview you need for driven or mountain hunting.
context.content:
Whether you’re involved in a driven hunt, stalking, or mountain hunting, the Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 rifle scope is versatile. Its remarkable field of view offers the overview you need for driven hunting, while you can benefit from its lightweight design and powerful performance during mountain hunting.

 

 

Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 1.7-13.3x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 13.6-42
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.1
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 75.6-9.3 / 25.2-3.1
Field of view (degrees) 14.4-1.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 4.8-23.6
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 54 / 1.5
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 44x0.75
